BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor  -  "AN ACT to authorize the city of New York to discontinue use of and convey a parcel of certain park land consisting of Saint Michael’s Park in the borough of Queens."  (S.3691-A / A.5246-A)
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Discontinue use of and convey a parcel of certain park land consisting of Saint Michael’s Park, Queens. (S.3691-A / A.5246-A)

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Resolution calling on President Obama to grant clemency to Oscar López Rivera so that he is immediately released from prison, as his continued incarceration is unjust and serves no legitimate purpose.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Calling on President Obama to grant clemency to Oscar López Rivera.

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor  -  "AN ACT to amend chapter 548 of the laws of 2010, amending the New York city charter relating to authorizing the city of New York to sell to abutting property owners real property owned by such city, consisting of tax lots that cannot be independently developed due to the size, shape, configuration and topography of such lots and the zoning regulations applicable thereto, in relation to the effectiveness thereof."  (S.5467-A/A.7872)
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Authorizing NYC to sell to abutting property owners real property owned by such city, consisting of tax lots that cannot be independently developed due to the size, shape, configuration and topography of such lots & the zoning. (S.5467-A/A.7872)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Golden, S.5610, and Assembly Member Abbate, et al., A.7648, “AN  ACT  to amend the administrative code of the  city  of  New  York,  in relation to promotions of captains”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Lanza, S.3472-A, and Assembly Member Cusick, A.7487, “AN ACT  to  amend  the general city law, in relation to certificates of occupancy for unmapped streets in the city of New York”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Certificates of occupancy for unmapped streets in the city of NY.  (S.3472-A/ A 7487)

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor  -  “AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to disability benefits for certain members of the New York city police pension fund, the New York city fire department pension fund and the New York city employees' retirement system”. (S.5705-B/ A.7854-B)
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Disability benefits for certain members of the NYC police pension fund, the NYC fire dept pension fund and the NYC employees' retirement system”. (S.5705-B/ A.7854-B)

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor  -  "AN ACT to authorize the city of New York to discontinue use of and convey a parcel of certain park land consisting of Saint Michael’s Park in the borough of Queens."  (S.3691-A / A.5246-A)
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Mayor's Message be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Discontinue use of and convey a parcel of certain park land consisting of Saint Michael’s Park, Queens. (S.3691-A / A.5246-A)
